document_data.name: Wand of Pyrotechnics
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wand of pyrotechnics''''' was a common [[magic]]al [[wand]] that created a burst of multicolored light.
document_data.Powers: With this wand, the caster was able to create a burst of multicolored light up to 60 feet (18 meters) from the caster. A sparkling noise was also created alongside the light, which could be heard as far as 300 feet (91 meters) away. The light was as bright as a flame but of very short duration, only lasting a second. The wand carried seven charges; when the last charge was used, the wand exploded into harmless bright sparks.
